Control.ttp: zhThis page provides information related to System Settings.

Control.lbl: zhBypass proxy server for local addresses:
Control.ttp: zhSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
zhChecked indicates that Proxy is enabled on this device.
zhClick to display online help related to this page...
zhClick to open the print dialog for sending the contents of this page to the default printer...
zhClick to refresh the contents of this page...

Messages.Message: zh'Internet Proxy Host' minimum length is 4.
zh'Internet Proxy Host' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
zh'Internet Proxy Port' minimum length is 2.
zh'Internet Proxy Port' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
